   21: %%
   22: -module(ssl_cert_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   28: -include("ssl_record.hrl").
   29: 
   30: %% Common test
   31: -export([all/0,
   32:          groups/0,
   33:          init_per_suite/1,
   34:          init_per_group/2,
   35:          init_per_testcase/2,
   36:          end_per_suite/1,
   37:          end_per_group/2,
   38:          end_per_testcase/2
   39:         ]).
   40: 
   41: %% Test cases
   42: -export([no_auth/0,
   43:          no_auth/1,
   44:          auth/0,
   45:          auth/1,
   46:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
   47:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
   48:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
   49:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1,
   50:          client_auth_no_suitable_chain/0,
   51:          client_auth_no_suitable_chain/1,
   52:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/0,
   53:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/1,
   54:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/0,
   55:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/1,
   56:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/0,
   57:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/1,
   58:          client_auth_sni/0,
   59:          client_auth_sni/1,
   60:          client_auth_seelfsigned_peer/0,
   61:          client_auth_seelfsigned_peer/1,
   62:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/0,
   63:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/1,
   64:          missing_root_cert_auth/0,
   65:          missing_root_cert_auth/1,
   66:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept/0,
   67:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept/1,
   68:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject/0,
   69:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject/1,
   70:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept/0,
   71:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept/1,
   72:          verify_fun_always_run_client/0,
   73:          verify_fun_always_run_client/1,
   74:          verify_fun_always_run_server/0,
   75:          verify_fun_always_run_server/1,
   76:          incomplete_chain_auth/0,
   77:          incomplete_chain_auth/1,
   78:          no_chain_client_auth/0,
   79:          no_chain_client_auth/1,
   80:          invalid_signature_client/0,
   81:          invalid_signature_client/1,
   82:          invalid_signature_server/0,
   83:          invalid_signature_server/1,
   84:          critical_extension_auth/0,
   85:          critical_extension_auth/1,
   86:          critical_extension_client_auth/0,
   87:          critical_extension_client_auth/1,
   88:          critical_extension_no_auth/0,
   89:          critical_extension_no_auth/1,
   90:          extended_key_usage_auth/0,
   91:          extended_key_usage_auth/1,
   92:          extended_key_usage_client_auth/0,
   93:          extended_key_usage_client_auth/1,
   94:          cert_expired/0,
   95:          cert_expired/1,
   96:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext/0,
   97:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext/1,
   98:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment/0,
   99:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment/1,
  100:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/0,
  101:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/1,
  102:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/0,
  103:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/1,
  104:          longer_chain/0,
  105:          longer_chain/1,
  106:          cross_signed_chain/0,
  107:          cross_signed_chain/1,
  108:          expired_root_with_cross_signed_root/0,
  109:          expired_root_with_cross_signed_root/1,
  110:          key_auth_ext_sign_only/0,
  111:          key_auth_ext_sign_only/1,
  112:          hello_retry_request/0,
  113:          hello_retry_request/1,
  114:          custom_groups/0,
  115:          custom_groups/1,
  116:          hello_retry_client_auth/0,
  117:          hello_retry_client_auth/1,
  118:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
  119:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
  120:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
  121:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1,
  122:          basic_rsa_1024/0,
  123:          basic_rsa_1024/1,
  124:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1/0,
  125:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1/1,
  126:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1/0,
  127:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1/1,
  128:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1/0,
  129:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1/1,
  130:          server_certificate_authorities_disabled/0,
  131:          server_certificate_authorities_disabled/1
  132:          ]).
  133: 
  134: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  135: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  136: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  137: 
  138: all() ->
  139:     [
  140:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  141:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  142:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  143:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
  144:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  145:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
  146:     ].
  147: 
  148: groups() ->
  149:     [
  150:      {'tlsv1.3', [], tls_1_3_protocol_groups()}, 
  151:      {'tlsv1.2', [], tls_1_2_protocol_groups()},
  152:      {'tlsv1.1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  153:      {'tlsv1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  154:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], tls_1_2_protocol_groups()},
  155:      {'dtlsv1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  156:      {rsa, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ pre_tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ++ [client_auth_seelfsigned_peer]},
  157:      {ecdsa, [], all_version_tests()},
  158:      {dsa, [], all_version_tests()},
  159:      {rsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++
  160:           tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ++ [client_auth_seelfsigned_peer, basic_rsa_1024]},
  161:      {rsa_pss_rsae, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_2_rsa_tests()},
  162:      {rsa_pss_rsae_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests()},
  163:      {rsa_pss_pss, [], all_version_tests()},
  164:      {rsa_pss_pss_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests()},
  165:      {ecdsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++
  166:           [signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1,
  167:            signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1,
  168:            signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1]},
  169:      {eddsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()}
  170:     ].
  171: 
  172: ssl_protocol_groups() ->
  173:     [{group, rsa},
  174:      {group, dsa}].
  175: 
  176: tls_1_2_protocol_groups() ->
  177:     [{group, rsa},
  178:      {group, ecdsa},
  179:      {group, dsa},
  180:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae},
  181:      {group, rsa_pss_pss}
  182:     ].
  183: 
  184: tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ->
  185:     [{group, rsa_1_3},
  186:      {group, ecdsa_1_3},
  187:      {group, eddsa_1_3},
  188:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae_1_3},
  189:      {group, rsa_pss_pss_1_3}
  190:     ].
  191: 
  192: tls_1_3_tests() ->
  193:     [
  194:      hello_retry_request,
  195:      custom_groups,
  196:      client_auth_no_suitable_chain,
  197:      hello_retry_client_auth,
  198:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  199:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected,
  200:      server_certificate_authorities_disabled
  201:     ].
  202: 
  203: pre_tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ->
  204:     [
  205:      key_auth_ext_sign_only
  206:     ].
  207: 
  208: rsa_tests() ->
  209:    [
  210:     longer_chain,
  211:     cross_signed_chain,
  212:     expired_root_with_cross_signed_root
  213:    ].
  214: 
  215: tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ->
  216:      [
  217:       unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
  218:       unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth
  219:      ].
  220: 
  221: tls_1_2_rsa_tests() ->
  222:      [
  223:       unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
  224:       unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth
  225:      ].
  226: 
  227: all_version_tests() ->
  228:     [
  229:      no_auth,
  230:      auth,
  231:      client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  232:      client_auth_empty_cert_rejected,
  233:      client_auth_use_partial_chain,
  234:      client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain,
  235:      client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail,
  236:      client_auth_sni,
  237:      missing_root_cert_no_auth,
  238:      missing_root_cert_auth,
  239:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept,
  240:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject,
  241:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept,
  242:      verify_fun_always_run_client,
  243:      verify_fun_always_run_server,
  244:      incomplete_chain_auth,
  245:      no_chain_client_auth,
  246:      invalid_signature_client,
  247:      invalid_signature_server,
  248:      critical_extension_auth,
  249:      critical_extension_client_auth,
  250:      critical_extension_no_auth,
  251:      extended_key_usage_auth,
  252:      extended_key_usage_client_auth,
  253:      cert_expired,
  254:      no_auth_key_identifier_ext,
  255:      no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment
  256:     ].
  257: 
  258: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  259:     catch crypto:stop(),
  260:     try crypto:start() of
  261: 	ok ->
  262:             Config
  263:     catch _:_ ->
  264: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  265:     end.
  266: 
  267: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  268:     ssl:stop(),
  269:     application:unload(ssl),
  270:     application:stop(crypto).
  271: 
  272: 
  273: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  274:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  275:         true  ->
  276:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  277:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName,
  278:                                         [{client_type, erlang},
  279:                                          {server_type, erlang},
  280:                                          {version, GroupName} | Config]);
  281:         false ->
  282:             do_init_per_group(GroupName, Config)
  283:     end.
  284: 
  285: do_init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == rsa;
  286:                                        Group == rsa_1_3 ->
  287:     Config1 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  288:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_1024_cert(Config1),
  289:     COpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  290:     SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  291:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  292:     [{cert_key_alg, rsa},
  293:      {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version)},
  294:      {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version)} |
  295:      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  296:                   [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  297:                    {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  298:                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  299:                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  300: do_init_per_group(Alg, Config) when Alg == rsa_pss_rsae;
  301:                                     Alg == rsa_pss_pss ->
  302:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  303:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  304:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  305: 
  306:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts)
  307:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts)
  308:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts) of
  309:         true ->
  310:             #{client_config := COpts,
  311:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_alg(Alg), [], Config, ""),
  312:             [{cert_key_alg, Alg},
  313:              {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version)},
  314:              {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version)} |
  315:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  316:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  317:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  318:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  319:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  320:         false ->
  321:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  322:     end;
  323: do_init_per_group(Alg, Config) when Alg == rsa_pss_rsae_1_3;
  324:                                     Alg == rsa_pss_pss_1_3 ->
  325: 
  326:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  327:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  328:     
  329:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts) 
  330:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts) 
  331:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts) of
  332:         true ->
  333:             #{client_config := COpts,
  334:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_alg(Alg), [], Config, ""),
  335:             [{cert_key_alg, rsa_alg(Alg)} |
  336:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  337:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  338:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  339:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  340:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  341:         false ->
  342:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  343:     end;
  344: do_init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == ecdsa;
  345:                                        Group == ecdsa_1_3 ->
  346: 
  347:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  348:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  349:         true ->
  350:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  351:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_verify_opts, Config),
  352:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  353:             [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  354:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  355:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  356:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  357:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  358:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  359:                          )];
  360:         false ->
  361:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  362:     end;
  363: do_init_per_group(eddsa_1_3, Config0) ->
  364:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  365:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0),
  366:     case lists:member(eddsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg)) of
  367:         true ->
  368:             Conf = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  369:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  370:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
  371:                                                client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  372:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  373:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()}}),
  374:             [{server_config, SOpts},
  375:              {client_config, COpts}] = x509_test:gen_pem_config_files(Conf, filename:join(PrivDir, "client_eddsa"),
  376:                                                                       filename:join(PrivDir, "server_eddsa")),
  377: 
  378:             [{cert_key_alg, eddsa} |
  379:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  380:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  381:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  382:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  383:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config0))]
  384:                          )];
  385:         false ->
  386:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  387:     end;
  388: do_init_per_group(dsa = Alg, Config0) ->
  389:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  390:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config0)),
  391:     case lists:member(dss, PKAlg) andalso lists:member(dh, PKAlg) of
  392:         true ->
  393:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_dsa_cert(Config0),
  394:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_dsa_opts, Config),
  395:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_dsa_opts, Config),
  396:             [{cert_key_alg, dsa},
  397:              {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version) ++
  398:                   [{ciphers, ssl_test_lib:dsa_suites(Version)}]},
  399:              {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version) ++
  400:                   [{ciphers, ssl_test_lib:dsa_suites(Version)}]} |
  401:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  402:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  403:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  404:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  405:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  406:         false ->
  407:             {skip, "Missing DSS crypto support"}
  408:     end;
  409: do_init_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
  410:     Config.
  411: 
  412: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  413:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  414: 
  415: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1, Config) ->
  416:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp256r1);
  417: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1, Config) ->
  418:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp384r1);
  419: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1, Config) ->
  420:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp521r1);
  421: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  422:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  423:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  424:     Config.
  425: 
  426: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  427:     Config.
  428: 
  429: init_ecdsa_opts(Config0, Curve) ->
  430:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config0)),
  431:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  432:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  433:         true ->
  434:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_ecdsa_cert(Config0, Curve),
  435:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_verify_opts, Config),
  436:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  437:             [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  438:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  439:                           [{client_cert_opts, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(ecdsa, Version) ++ COpts},
  440:                            {server_cert_opts, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(ecdsa, Version) ++ SOpts} |
  441:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  442:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  443:                          )];
  444:         false ->
  445:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  446:     end.
  447: 
  448: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  449: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  450: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  451: no_auth() ->
  452:      ssl_cert_tests:no_auth().
  453: 
  454: no_auth(Config) ->
  455:       ssl_cert_tests:no_auth(Config).
  456: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  457: auth() ->
  458:     ssl_cert_tests:auth().
  459: auth(Config) ->
  460:     ssl_cert_tests:auth(Config).
  461: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  462: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
  463:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted().
  464: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
  465:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config).
  466: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  467: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
  468:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected().
  469: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
  470:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config).
  471: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  472: client_auth_no_suitable_chain() ->
  473:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_no_suitable_chain().
  474: client_auth_no_suitable_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  475:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_no_suitable_chain(Config).
  476: 
  477: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  478: client_auth_use_partial_chain() ->
  479:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_use_partial_chain().
  480: client_auth_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  481:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_use_partial_chain(Config).
  482: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  483: client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain() ->
  484:    ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain().
  485: client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  486:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain(Config).
  487:

  511: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  512: missing_root_cert_auth() ->
  513:     [{doc,"Must have ROOT certs to be able to verify verify peer"}].
  514: missing_root_cert_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  515:     ServerOpts =  proplists:delete(cacertfile, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config)),
  516:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  517:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  518:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  519: 					      {from, self()},
  520: 					      {options, no_reuse(Version) ++ [{verify, verify_peer}
  521:                                                                              | ServerOpts]}]),
  522: 
  523:     Error = {error, {options, incompatible,
  524:                      [{verify,verify_peer},{cacerts,undefined}]}},
  525:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, Error),
  526:     
  527:     ClientOpts =  proplists:delete(cacertfile, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config)),
  528:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  529: 					      {from, self()},
  530: 					      {options, [{verify, verify_peer}
  531: 							 | ClientOpts]}]),
  532: 
  533:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, Error).
  534:     
  535: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  536: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept() ->
  537:     [{doc, "Test that the client succeeds if the ROOT CA is unknown in verify_peer mode"
  538:      " with a verify_fun that accepts the unknown CA error"}].
  539: 
  540: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept(Config) ->
  541:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  542:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  543:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{bad_cert, unknown_ca}, UserState) ->
  544: 			    {valid, UserState};
  545: 		       (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  546: 			    {fail, Reason};
  547: 		       (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
  548: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  549: 		       (_, valid, UserState) ->
  550: 			    {valid, UserState};
  551: 		       (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  552: 			    {valid, UserState}
  553: 		    end, []},
  554:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  555:                                           [{verify, verify_peer}, {verify_fun, FunAndState},
  556:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
  557:                                           Config),
  558:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  559: 
  560: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  561: missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept() ->
  562:     [{doc, "Test old style verify fun"}].
  563: 
  564: missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept(Config) ->
  565:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  566:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  567:     AcceptBadCa = fun({bad_cert,unknown_ca}, Acc) ->  Acc;
  568:                      (Other, Acc) -> [Other | Acc]
  569: 		  end,
  570:     VerifyFun =
  571: 	fun(ErrorList) ->
  572: 		case lists:foldl(AcceptBadCa, [], ErrorList) of
  573: 		    [] ->    true;
  574: 		    [_|_] -> false
  575: 		end
  576: 	end,
  577:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  578:                                           [{verify, verify_peer},
  579:                                            {verify_fun, VerifyFun},
  580:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}], Config),
  581:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  582: 
  583: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  584: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject() ->
  585:     [{doc, "Test that the client fails if the ROOT CA is unknown in verify_peer mode"
  586:      " with a verify_fun that rejects the unknown CA error"}].
  587: 
  588: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject(Config) ->
  589:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  590:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  591:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{bad_cert, unknown_ca} = Reason, _UserState) ->
  592: 			    {fail, Reason};
  593: 		       (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  594: 			    {fail, Reason};
  595: 		       (_,{extension, UserState}, _) ->
  596: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  597: 		       (_, valid, UserState) ->
  598: 			    {valid, UserState};
  599: 		       (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  600: 			    {valid, UserState}
  601: 		    end, []},
  602:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  603:                                           [{verify, verify_peer},
  604:                                            {verify_fun, FunAndState},
  605:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
  606:                                           Config),
  607:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, unknown_ca).
  608: 
  609: 
  610: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  611: incomplete_chain_auth() ->
  612:     [{doc,"Test that we can verify an incompleat chain when we have the certs to rebuild it"}].
  613: incomplete_chain_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  614:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  615:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  616:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  617:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  618:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  619:                                                                         [{server_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  620:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),   
  621:     [ServerRoot| _] = ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
  622:     ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
  623:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
  624:                                                          {cacerts,  ServerCas ++ ClientCas} |
  625:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)], Config),
  626:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer},
  627:                                                          {cacerts, [ServerRoot]} |
  628:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)], Config),
  629:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  630: 
  631: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  632: no_chain_client_auth() ->
  633:     [{doc,"In TLS-1.3 test that we allow sending only peer cert if chain CAs are missing and hence"
  634:       " we can not determine if client is in servers auth domain or not, so send and hope"
  635:       " that the cert chain is in the auth domain and that the server possess "
  636:       " intermediates to recreate the chain."}].
  637: no_chain_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  638:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  639:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  640:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  641:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  642:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  643:                                                                         [{server_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  644:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  645:     ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
  646:     [ClientRoot| _] = ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
  647:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
  648:                                                          {cacerts, [ClientRoot]} |
  649:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)], Config),
  650:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer},
  651:                                                          {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  652:                                                          {cacerts,  ClientCas ++ ServerCas} |
  653:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)], Config),
  654:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  655: 
  656: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  657: verify_fun_always_run_client() ->
  658:     [{doc,"Verify that user verify_fun is always run (for valid and "
  659:       "valid_peer not only unknown_extension)"}].
  660: 
  661: verify_fun_always_run_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  662:     ClientOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  663:     ServerOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  664:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  665:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  666:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  667: 					      {from, self()},
  668: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  669: 						     no_result, []}},
  670: 					      {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ ServerOpts}]),
  671:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  672: 
  673:     %% If user verify fun is called correctly we fail the connection.
  674:     %% otherwise we cannot tell this case apart form where we miss
  675:     %% to call users verify fun
  676:     FunAndState =  {fun(_, Der, {extension, _}, UserState) ->
  677:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  678: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  679: 		       (_, Der, valid, [ChainLen]) ->
  680:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  681: 			    {valid, [ChainLen + 1]};
  682: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, [1]) ->
  683:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  684: 			    {fail, "verify_fun_was_always_run"};
  685: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  686:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  687: 			    {valid, UserState}
  688: 		    end, [0]},
  689: 
  690:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  691: 					      {host, Hostname},
  692: 					      {from, self()},
  693: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  694: 						     no_result, []}},
  695: 					      {options,
  696: 					       [{verify, verify_peer},
  697: 						{verify_fun, FunAndState}
  698: 						| ClientOpts]}]),
  699: 
  700:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, handshake_failure).
  701: 
  702: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  703: verify_fun_always_run_server() ->
  704:     [{doc,"Verify that user verify_fun is always run (for valid and "
  705:       "valid_peer not only unknown_extension)"}].
  706: verify_fun_always_run_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  707:     ClientOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  708:     ServerOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  709:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  710: 
  711:     %% If user verify fun is called correctly we fail the connection.
  712:     %% otherwise we cannot tell this case apart form where we miss
  713:     %% to call users verify fun
  714:     FunAndState =  {fun(_, Der, {extension, _}, UserState) ->
  715:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  716: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  717: 		       (_, Der, valid, [ChainLen]) ->
  718:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  719: 			    {valid, [ChainLen + 1]};
  720: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, [1]) ->
  721:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  722: 			    {fail, "verify_fun_was_always_run"};
  723: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  724:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  725: 			    {valid, UserState}
  726: 		    end, [0]},
  727: 
  728:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  729:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  730: 					      {from, self()},
  731: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  732: 						     no_result, []}},
  733: 					      {options,
  734:                                                no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer},
  735:                                                                                 {verify_fun, FunAndState} |
  736:                                                                                 ServerOpts]}]),
  737:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  738: 
  739:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  740: 					      {host, Hostname},
  741: 					      {from, self()},
  742: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  743: 						     no_result, []}},
  744: 					      {options, ClientOpts}]),
  745:     
  746:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, handshake_failure).
  747: 
  748: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------

  761: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  762: critical_extension_auth() ->
  763:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical unknown extension in verify_peer mode"}].
  764: 
  765: critical_extension_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  766:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  767:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  768:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  769:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  770:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  771:                                                                          [{server_chain, 
  772:                                                                            [[],[],[{extensions, Ext}]]},
  773:                                                                           {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  774:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  775:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  776:  
  777:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  778:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  779:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error(
  780:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  781:                 {from, self()},
  782:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  no_result, []}},
  783:                 {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts]}]),
  784:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  785:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
  786:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  787:                 {host, Hostname},
  788:                 {from, self()},
  789:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  790:                 {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  791: 
  792:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, unsupported_certificate).
  793: 
  794: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  795: critical_extension_client_auth() ->
  796:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical unknown extension in verify_peer mode"}].
  797: 
  798: critical_extension_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  799:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  800:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  801:      #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  802:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  803:                                                                          [{client_chain, 
  804:                                                                            [[],[],[{extensions, Ext}]]},
  805:                                                                           {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  806:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  807:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  808:     
  809:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  810:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  811:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error(
  812:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  813:                 {from, self()},
  814:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  815:                 {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  816:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  817:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
  818:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  819:                 {host, Hostname},
  820:                 {from, self()},
  821:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  822:                 {options, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]}]),
  823: 
  824:     %% This certificate has a critical extension that we don't
  825:     %% understand.  Therefore, verification should fail.          
  826:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, unsupported_certificate).
  827:

  834:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  835:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  836:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  837:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  838:                                                                             [{server_chain, 
  839:                                                                               [[],[], [{extensions, Ext}]]},
  840:                                                                              {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  841:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_none} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
  842:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_none} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
  843:     
  844:      ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).

  847: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  848: extended_key_usage_auth() ->
  849:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical extended_key_usage extension in server cert"}].
  850: 
  851: extended_key_usage_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  852:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  853:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  854:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  855:                                  [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
  856:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  857:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  858:                                                                         [{server_chain, 
  859:                                                                           [[],[], [{extensions, Ext}]]},
  860:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}
  861:                                                                         ]),
  862:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  863:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  864: 
  865:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  866:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  867:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  868: 					{from, self()},
  869:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  870: 			   {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts]}]),
  871:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  872:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  873: 					{host, Hostname},
  874: 			   {from, self()},
  875:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  876: 					{options, [{verify, verify_peer} |
  877: 						   ClientOpts]}]),
  878:     
  879:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  880: 
  881:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  882:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  883: 
  884: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  885: extended_key_usage_client_auth() ->
  886:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical extended_key_usage extension in client and server cert"}].
  887: 
  888: extended_key_usage_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  889:     ServerExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  890:                                        [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
  891:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  892:                                        [?'id-kp-clientAuth'], true}]),
  893:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  894:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  895:                                                                         [{client_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
  896:                                                                          {server_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ServerExt}]]}]),
  897:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  898:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  899:    
  900:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  901:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  902:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  903: 					{from, self()},
  904:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  905:                                         {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  906:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  907:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  908: 					{host, Hostname},
  909: 			   {from, self()},
  910: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  911: 					{options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  912:     
  913:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  914: 
  915:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  916:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  917: 
  918: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  919: cert_expired() ->
  920:     [{doc,"Test server with expired certificate"}].
  921: 
  922: cert_expired(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  923:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  924:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  925:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
  926:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  927:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  928:                                                                         [{server_chain,
  929:                                                                           [[],
  930:                                                                            [{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
  931:                                                                                         {Year-1, Month, Day}}}],
  932:                                                                            []
  933:                                                                      ]},
  934:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  935:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  936:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  937:     
  938:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  939:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  940:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  941: 					      {from, self()},
  942: 					      {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ ServerOpts}]),
  943:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  944:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  945: 					      {host, Hostname},
  946: 					      {from, self()},
  947: 					      {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),    
  948:     
  949:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, certificate_expired).
  950: 
  951: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  952: no_auth_key_identifier_ext() ->
  953:     [{doc, "Test cert that does not have authorityKeyIdentifier extension"}].
  954: 
  955: no_auth_key_identifier_ext(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  956:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  957:       #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  958:         server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
  959:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  960:                                           [{client_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  961:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  962:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
  963:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
  964:  
  965:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  966:     
  967: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  968: no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment() ->
  969:     [{doc, "Test cert with keyEncipherment key_usage an no"
  970:       " authorityKeyIdentifier extension"}].
  971: 
  972: no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  973:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  974:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{key_usage, [digitalSignature, keyEncipherment]}]),
  975:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  976:         server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
  977:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  978:                                           [{client_chain, 
  979:                                             [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
  980:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}
  981:                                           ]),
  982:     ClientOpts =   [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
  983:     ServerOpts =   [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
  984:     
  985:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  986: 
  987: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  988: key_auth_ext_sign_only() ->
  989:     [{doc, "Test that client with a certificate without keyEncipherment usage "
  990:     " extension can connect to a server with restricted cipher suites "}].
  991: key_auth_ext_sign_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  992:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  993:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{key_usage, [digitalSignature]}]),
  994:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  995:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
  996:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  997:                                           [{client_chain, 
  998:                                             [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
  999:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}
 1000:                                           ]),
 1001:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 1002:     ClientOpts =  [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
 1003:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {ciphers, 
 1004:                                           ssl_test_lib:rsa_non_signed_suites(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version))} 
 1005:                  | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
 1006:     
 1007:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1008: 
 1009: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1010: longer_chain() ->
 1011:     [{doc,"Test depth option"}].
 1012: longer_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1013:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
 1014:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1015:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
 1016:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}],
 1017:                                                                         [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
 1018:                                                                         [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}]],
 1019:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]},
 1020:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
 1021:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
 1022:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
 1023:     [ServerRoot| _] = ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
 1024:     ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
 1025:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1026:     
 1027:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [ServerRoot]} |
 1028:                                            proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version), Config),
 1029:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
 1030:                                            {depth, 5},
 1031:                                            {cacerts,  ServerCas ++ ClientCas} |
 1032:                                            proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)]++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) , Config),
 1033:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1034: 
 1035: cross_signed_chain() ->
 1036:     [{doc, "Manual test of chain with duplicate entries that is cross signing certs are present."}].
 1037: cross_signed_chain(Config)
 1038:   when is_list(Config) ->
 1039:     Key1 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1),
 1040:     Key2 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2),
 1041:     Key3 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3),
 1042:     Key4 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4),
 1043:     Key5 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5),
 1044: 
 1045:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0, client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1046:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, Key1}],
 1047:                                                       peer => [{key, Key5}]},
 1048:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key3}],
 1049:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key3}]],
 1050:                                                       peer => [{key, Key1}]}}),
 1051: 
 1052:     #{client_config := ClientOptsNew} =
 1053:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, Key1}],
 1054:                                                       peer => [{key, Key5}]},
 1055:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key4}],
 1056:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key1}]],
 1057:                                                       peer => [{key, Key1}]}}),
 1058: 
 1059:     ServerCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
 1060:     ClientCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
 1061:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1062: 
 1063:     {[Peer,CI1,CI2,CROld], CROld} = chain_and_root(ClientOpts0),
 1064:     {[_Peer,CI1New,CI2New,CRNew], CRNew} = chain_and_root(ClientOptsNew),
 1065: 
 1066:     ServerCas = [CRNew|ServerCas0 -- [CROld]],
 1067:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1068:                                                          lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1, ServerOpts0, {cacerts, ServerCas})]
 1069:                                           ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1070:                                           Config),
 1071:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1072:                                                          lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1,
 1073:                                                                           lists:keyreplace(cert, 1, ClientOpts0,
 1074:                                                                              {cert, [Peer,CI1New,CI2New,CI1,CI2,CRNew,CROld]}),
 1075:                                                                           {cacerts, ClientCas0})] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1076:                                           Config),
 1077:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
 1078:     ClientOpts2 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1079:                                                           lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1,
 1080:                                                                            lists:keyreplace(cert, 1, ClientOpts0,
 1081:                                                                                             {cert, [Peer,CI1,CI1New,CI2,CI2New,CROld,CRNew]}),
 1082:                                                                            {cacerts, ClientCas0})] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1083:                                            Config),
 1084:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts2, ServerOpts, Config),
 1085:     ok.
 1086: 
 1087: expired_root_with_cross_signed_root() ->
 1088:     [{doc,"Test that we can verify a chain with an expired Root Cert if there is an alternative chain with"
 1089:       " a cross signed Root CA further down the chain that is however not present in the sent chain"}].
 1090: expired_root_with_cross_signed_root(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1091: 
 1092:     Key1 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1),
 1093:     Key2 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2),
 1094:     Key3 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3),
 1095:     Key4 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4),
 1096:     Key5 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5),
 1097:     Key6 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6),
 1098:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
 1099: 
 1100:     %% Create expired ROOT
 1101:     #{cert := Root} = SRoot = public_key:pkix_test_root_cert("OTP test server ROOT", [{key, Key1},
 1102:                                                                     {validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
 1103:                                                                                 {Year-1, Month, Day}}}]),
 1104:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0, client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1105:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => SRoot,
 1106:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key3}]],
 1107:                                                       peer => [{key, Key4}]},
 1108:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key5}],
 1109:                                                       peer => [{key, Key6}]}}),
 1110:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1111:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ClientOpts0,
 1112:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ServerOpts0,
 1113: 
 1114:     SCert = proplists:get_value(cert, ServerOpts),
 1115:     SCerts = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts),
 1116: 
 1117:     {ok, ExtractedCAs} = ssl_pkix_db:extract_trusted_certs({der, SCerts}),
 1118:     {ok, Root, [_Peer, CA1, CA2, Root]} = ssl_certificate:certificate_chain(SCert, ets:new(foo, []), 
 1119:                                                                             ExtractedCAs, [], encoded),
 1120: 
 1121:     OTPCA1 = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CA1, otp),
 1122:     OTPCA2 = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CA2, otp),
 1123: 
 1124:     TBS1 = OTPCA1#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
 1125:     TBS2 = OTPCA2#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
 1126: 
 1127:     Issuer = TBS1#'OTPTBSCertificate'.issuer,
 1128: 
 1129:     SubjectPublicKeyInfo = TBS2#'OTPTBSCertificate'.subjectPublicKeyInfo,
 1130: 
 1131:     AltCrossRoot = public_key:pkix_sign(TBS1#'OTPTBSCertificate'{subject = Issuer,
 1132:                                                                  subjectPublicKeyInfo = SubjectPublicKeyInfo}, Key2),
 1133: 
 1134:     ClientCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts),
 1135: 
 1136:     %% Only expired ROOT present
 1137:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert([{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts], ServerOpts, Config, certificate_expired),
 1138:     %% Only CROSS ROOT present
 1139:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer},
 1140:                              {cacerts, [AltCrossRoot]} | proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts)], ServerOpts, Config),
 1141:     %% Both expired ROOT and CROSS ROOT present
 1142:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer},
 1143:                              {cacerts, [AltCrossRoot | ClientCas0]} | proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts)],
 1144:                             ServerOpts, Config).
 1145: 
 1146: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1147: %% TLS 1.3 Test cases  -----------------------------------------------
 1148: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1149: hello_retry_request() ->
 1150:     [{doc,"Test that ssl server can request a new group when the client's first key share"
 1151:       "is not supported"}].
 1152: 
 1153: hello_retry_request(Config) ->
 1154:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1155:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1156:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1157:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1158:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1159:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]} | ClientOpts0],
 1160:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1161: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1162: custom_groups() ->
 1163:     [{doc,"Test that ssl server can select a common group for key-exchange"}].
 1164: 
 1165: custom_groups(Config) ->
 1166:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1167:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1168: 
 1169:     %% Set versions
 1170:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1171:                   {supported_groups, [x448, secp256r1, secp384r1]}|ServerOpts0],
 1172:     ClientOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1173:     ClientOpts = [{supported_groups,[secp384r1, secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts1],
 1174:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1175: 
 1176: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1177: %% Triggers a Server Alert as ssl client does not have a certificate with a
 1178: %% signature algorithm supported by the server (signature_algorithms_cert extension
 1179: %% of CertificateRequest does not contain the algorithm of the client certificate).
 1180: %% ssl client sends an empty certificate.
 1181: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth() ->
 1182:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (backported to TLS-1.2) : Test client authentication with unsupported signature_algorithm_cert"}].
 1183: 
 1184: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth(Config) ->
 1185:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1186:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1187:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1188:                   {signature_algs, [rsa_pkcs1_sha256, rsa_pkcs1_sha384, rsa_pss_rsae_sha256, rsa_pss_pss_sha256]},
 1189:                   %% Skip rsa_pkcs1_sha256!
 1190:                   {signature_algs_cert, [rsa_pkcs1_sha384, rsa_pkcs1_sha512]},
 1191:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}|ServerOpts0],
 1192:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 1193:     case Version of
 1194:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 1195:             ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required);
 1196:         _  ->
 1197:             ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, bad_certificate)
 1198:     end.
 1199: 
 1200: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1201: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth() ->
 1202:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (backported to TLS-1.2): Test client authentication with unsupported signature_algorithm"}].
 1203: 
 1204: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth(Config) ->
 1205:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1206:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1207:     ClientOpts = [{signature_algs, [rsa_pkcs1_sha256, rsa_pss_rsae_sha256]} | ClientOpts0],
 1208:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1209:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_sha1, rsa_pss_pss_sha256]},
 1210:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}|ServerOpts0],
 1211:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1212: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1213: hello_retry_client_auth() ->
 1214:     [{doc, "TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication."}].
 1215: 
 1216: hello_retry_client_auth(Config) ->
 1217:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1218:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1219:     ServerOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1220:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1221:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1222:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts0],
 1223:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1224:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} | ServerOpts1],
 1225: 
 1226:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1227: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1228: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
 1229:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication when client sends an empty " 
 1230:        "certificate and fail_if_no_peer_cert is set to true."}].
 1231: 
 1232: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
 1233:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1234:     %% Delete Client Cert and Key
 1235:     ClientOpts1 = proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0),
 1236:     ClientOpts2 = proplists:delete(keyfile, ClientOpts1),
 1237: 
 1238:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1239:     %% Set versions
 1240:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1241:                   {verify, verify_peer},
 1242:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, false},
 1243:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1244:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1245:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts2],
 1246:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1247: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1248: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
 1249:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication when client "
 1250:        "sends an empty certificate and fail_if_no_peer_cert is set to true."}].
 1251: 
 1252: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
 1253:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1254:     %% Delete Client Cert and Key
 1255:     ClientOpts1 = proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0),
 1256:     ClientOpts2 = proplists:delete(keyfile, ClientOpts1),
 1257: 
 1258:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1259:     %% Set versions
 1260:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1261:                   {verify, verify_peer},
 1262:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 1263:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1264:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1265:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts2],
 1266:    
 1267:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required).
 1268: 
 1269: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1270: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1() ->
 1271:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1272:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1273: 
 1274: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1(Config) ->
 1275:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1276:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1277:     %% Set versions
 1278:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts0],
 1279:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1280:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 1281:                                     ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 1282:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],
 1283: 
 1284:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1285: 
 1286: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1287: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1() ->
 1288:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1289:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1290: 
 1291: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1(Config) ->
 1292:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1293:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1294:     %% Set versions
 1295:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts0],
 1296:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1297:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 1298:                                     ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 1299:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],
 1300: 
 1301:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1302: 
 1303: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1304: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1() ->
 1305:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1306:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1307: 
 1308: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1(Config) ->
 1309:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1310:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1311:     %% Set versions
 1312:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1313:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp512r1_sha256,
 1314:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}
 1315:                  | ServerOpts0],
 1316:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1317:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 1318:                                     ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 1319:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],
 1320:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1321: 
 1322: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1323: basic_rsa_1024() ->
 1324:     [{doc, "TLS 1.3 (Basic): Test if connection can be established using 1024 bits RSA keys in certificates."}].
 1325: 
 1326: basic_rsa_1024(Config) ->
 1327:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_1024_opts, Config),
 1328:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_1024_opts, Config),
 1329:     ServerOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
 1330:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1331:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1332:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} | ServerOpts1],
 1333:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1334: 
 1335: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1336: server_certificate_authorities_disabled() ->
 1337:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Disabling certificate_authorities extension on the server when verify_peer is set to true"
 1338:        " allows the client to send a chain that could be verifiable by the server but that would not adhere to"
 1339:        " the certificate_authorities extension as it is not part of the regular trusted certificate set"}].
 1340: 
 1341: server_certificate_authorities_disabled(Config) ->
 1342:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1343:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1344: 
 1345:     % Strip out the ClientRoot to simulate cases where the they are manually managed and
 1346:     % not expected to be included in certificate requests during mutual authentication.
 1347:     {ok, CACerts0} = ssl_pkix_db:decode_pem_file(proplists:get_value(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)),
 1348:     [_ClientRoot | ServerCACerts] = [CertDER || {_, CertDER, _} <- CACerts0],
 1349: 
 1350:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
 1351:                             {unknown, UserState};
 1352:                        (_, valid, UserState) ->
 1353:                             {valid, UserState};
 1354:                        % Because this is a manually managed setup, we also need to manually verify
 1355:                        % an unknown_ca (ClientCert) as expected. Typically you would have custom logic
 1356:                        % here to decide if you know the cert (like looking up pinned values in a DB)
 1357:                        % but for testing purposes, we'll allow everything
 1358:                        (_, {bad_cert, unknown_ca}, UserState) ->
 1359:                             {valid, UserState};
 1360:                        (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
 1361:                             {valid, UserState}
 1362:                     end, [0]},
 1363: 
 1364:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}, {verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts0],
 1365:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}, {verify, verify_peer},
 1366:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {cacerts, ServerCACerts},
 1367:                   {verify_fun, FunAndState} | ServerOpts0],
 1368:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required),
 1369:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, [{certificate_authorities, false} | ServerOpts], Config).
 1370: 
 1371: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1372: %% Internal functions  -----------------------------------------------
 1373: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1374: rsa_alg(rsa_pss_rsae_1_3) ->
 1375:     rsa_pss_rsae;
 1376: rsa_alg(rsa_pss_pss_1_3) ->
 1377:     rsa_pss_pss;
 1378: rsa_alg(Atom) ->
 1379:     Atom.
 1380: 
 1381: no_reuse(?TLS_1_3) ->
 1382:     [];
 1383: no_reuse(_) ->
 1384:     [{reuse_sessions, false}].
 1385: 
 1386: chain_and_root(Config) ->
 1387:     OwnCert = proplists:get_value(cert, Config),
 1388:     {ok, ExtractedCAs} = ssl_pkix_db:extract_trusted_certs({der, proplists:get_value(cacerts, Config)}),
 1389:     {ok, Root, Chain} = ssl_certificate:certificate_chain(OwnCert, ets:new(foo, []), ExtractedCAs, [], encoded),
 1390:     {Chain, Root}.
 1391:
